scripts.gen: npm run gen-paxful && npm run gen-webhook && npm run gen-fix-names
scripts.gen-paxful: java --add-opens=java.base/java.util=ALL-UNNAMED -cp ./src/gen/engine/target/pxSdk-swagger-codegen-1.0.0.jar:../swagger-codegen/modules/swagger-codegen-cli/target/swagger-codegen-cli.jar io.swagger.codegen.v3.cli.SwaggerCodegen generate -t src/gen/templates -i schema.json -l pxSdk -o src/gen/paxful -D withInterfaces=true
scripts.gen-webhook: java --add-opens=java.base/java.util=ALL-UNNAMED -cp ./src/gen/engine/target/pxSdk-swagger-codegen-1.0.0.jar:../swagger-codegen/modules/swagger-codegen-cli/target/swagger-codegen-cli.jar io.swagger.codegen.v3.cli.SwaggerCodegen generate -t src/gen/templates -i schema_webhook.json -l pxSdk -o src/gen/webhook -D withInterfaces=true
scripts.doc: typedoc --out public -ยง`-readme README.md --exclude "**/__tests__/**/*.+(ts|tsx|js)" --exclude "**/jest.config.js" --excludeNotDocumented --name "Paxful SDK (Javascript)" --hideGenerator --disableSources --highlightTheme light-plus src/
